channel.title: Help With adding items on log in
channel.description: Well, I noticed the starters don't work properly because you can just log out and get a new one. So I decided to make it when you first log in you get 50m..But I can't find out how to do it, I see the basic idea..But can't find out how to add the item, and I especially don't know how to make it when u first log in.

item.title: Help With adding items on log in
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Well, I noticed the starters don’t work properly because you can just log out and get a new one. So I decided to make it when you first log in you get 50m…But I can’t find out how to do it, I see the basic idea…But can’t find out how to add the item, and I especially don’t know how to make it when u first log in.

Read full topic
item.source: Help With adding items on log in
